bow: top most ridiculous baby items that have come across what makes your list love my wipes warmer it definitely luxury item but want one if were baby we also have the snuza hero movement monitor and it was well worth it for the peace of mind sleep better when he wearing it for sure did the 400 dollar custom baby bedding thing did even use his crib and ended up cosleeping for 20 months so dumb by that time he was obsessed with thomas the train and would only sleep with his thomas blanket it sits in the top of his closet never used stroller everyone said we had to have one it maybe gets used once every months and that because force myself to use it crib bedding never used it we just took the crib down last week and tossed it ve heard that the baby monitoring equipment tends to have numerous false alarms mostly due to positioning improper wearing baby breathing lightly have you found this to be true with yours we love our stroller and we use it all the time but have twins and they are way too heavy wiggly cumbersome to try to carry anywhere on my own so of course use the stroller anytime leave the house with singleton baby sure it would be superfluous in most cases though even if you are babywearer ended up not being baby wearer or stroller mommy because my kid just could stand to be confined in any way ironically as soon as he started walking well he fell in love with baby doll stroller at flea market and ended up pushing that around everywhere kids amirite we did think we would need wipe warmer but our daughter would get upset when the cold wipe touched her bottom as much as hate the cold suppose should have been surprised we did change her outside of the home very often for the first few months of her life she did get the chance to get used to non warmed wipes of course but the less fussy she was the happier her parents were baby bathtubs they are just one more piece of junk to clutter the house and then to try to unload at garage sale seriously use the kitchen sink with towel in the bottom to cushion ditto on the wipe warmer we still use it for our year old agree with everything else though love the baby bathtub until they can sit up the one we have has gone through two kids now and has made life easier because our sinks here were designed chosen by someone who did think kids would be washed in them even though we live in houses specifically for families with kids wtg military um we use ours bathtub everyday like my wipe warmer the cold wo wake my lo up during the night diaper change we had angelcare breathing monitor one false alarm in 18 months and provided great peace of mind really important to remember that they do nothing to prevent sids though quite often when see baby pictures on mommit or daddit the cots seem totally rammed full of bedding and teddies we had mattress sheet and thin blanket and that was it now he is bigger he has pillow duvet and bastiom the cat that is all we use our stroller plenty on the petite side and our daughter has grown much faster than did as baby add on the unplanned section took while to recover from and the stroller was god send at events like fairs it is great to not worry about her getting too tired to walk or wandering off my wipe warmer was like 10 and love it so hmph yeah think lot of parents the ones see on baby center message boards etc think that these things will help prevent sids also they tend to be neurotic about it false alarm and they are calling their pediatrician at know we have our cribs the firm crib mattress sheet and then the babies are swaddled nothing else in there except for maybe pacifier do know how everyone else does diaper changes in the middle of the night but do change their diapers unless they are already awake for feeding before feed them or if they are already awake because of their diaper do sneak in and change them in the middle of the night for funsies they forgot the peepee teepee you and me both my daughter would wake up and decide it was party time if did that got two yes two baby bathrobes they do work as well as towels they are hanging up as decoration in the bathroom we use the bucket style baby tub she loves that thing because she can splash around and keep most of her body submerged without the worry of having her face near the water level we have one of those we ve only used it for adorable post bath pictures haha did even think about those everyone swore to me would need them when they found out was having twin boys months later and have literally never once been peed on my son is 13 months and we still use the baby bathtub every day we use it in the tub now but it uses half the water of filling up the whole bathtub for him the baby monitoring equipment could actually be helpful for some parents like those who are deaf it would be an immense comfort to see heart rate and get notifications so while it might not be overly practical for all parents could certainly see some instances where this would be viable option can ask you what brand you have very interested in this option my cousin told me the same thing about her winter baby she said she thought the wipe warmer was so stupid and refused to register for it then went out and bought one within few weeks of her son birth because he would scream in the middle of the night when she change him because of the cold wipe it only 25 bucks usually so not much of gamble with you did initially buy wipe warmer until was peed on 10+ times after the cold wipe hit his bottom ordered one and used it as soon as could have been peed on since used it from the start with the second and have been peed on since prince lionheart http www amazon com gp aw b000qij020 pc redir=1408337958 amp robot redir=1 we love it but as with any bath you have to be really careful to keep baby from slipping down and getting his her head underwater my baby likes to try to scrunch up to let the water hit her lips and have to stop her constantly haha thank you sure thing exactly or if you have little one with health issues helps your sanity we ve only had two false alarms and it was because my husband put it on too loosely the better quality of sleep for me is well worth the rare false alarm is it meant for babies with health issues feel like it only marketed toward the obsessive new parent would preemie with heart defect per se have this recommended for them or would hospital grade monitoring system something else be preferred this too my sil first child had heart condition and this would have helped calm her anxiety those little nick pillows for the car seat do work baby hates it looks uncomfortable as hell but the little owl on it though guess it the difference between eyes half open and body limp level of woken up and screaming his head off level of woken up oh yeah totally agree on those cases was thinking in the context of lesser illnesses like kiddos with extreme reflux where its sometimes recommended for them to sleep on their bellies to avoid aspiration of fluids definitely want bit more peace of mind in that case but you re probably right the manufacturer intent is to profit off of worried new parents that adorable had monitor that attached to my sons diaper when he was an infant it went off few times as he got older and shuffled around his crib more but loved it it helped me sleep much better at night and relax more when he was napping the first three weeks after he was born would jerk out of dead sleep every hour or so to make sure he was still breathing sanity saver in my opinion yeah we are all about baby wearing and she started walking at months dude you need to try to sell that thing ve tried once or twice too disagree on the wipe warmer my son was december baby and this girl will be too to imagine trying to change baby in the middle of the night who is tired pooped everywhere and hungry do want to make it worse by using an ice cold wipe love mine too put cloth wipes and wipe solution in it and it makes cleaning poopy bit more pleasant adding my approval for the wipe warmer as well baby does mind the cold wipes when we re out and about but the unit does make nice appropriately sized storage box for our cloth wipes have to disagree with the formula machine had many issues breast feeding so we are exclusively formula fed here this thing has saved so much time as you literally put the bottle under the spout choose your amount and press start it pretty immediate and to temperature will gladly pay the expense one time than to stumble around the kitchen at 2am trying to measure out water and formula mix it up and then wait for it to get warm in the bottle warmer my lo would not take cold water when he was tiny while letting him get more and more worked up crying and screaming and waking everyone up because he has to wait for his bottle even just thinking back to that before we got the machine stresses me out it is life and timesaver figures my little girl pees on me frequently lol that totally depends on your lifestyle use my stroller rather than car walk several miles with it every day love it one of my top baby purchases if you only had one baby drive everywhere you go and then wear the baby can see it as unnecessary just so another unknowing mom buys it only to store it on top of her closet as well no way haha would burden new mommah with that you threw away an unused crib we got it second hand so it was used we just did use it it seems similar to keurig vs traditional coffee machine sure you can just do the scooping and the measuring each time you make your coffee but some people are so non functioning until they have their coffee the keurig is god send super glad can breastfeed easily but think would be tempted by one of these if had to formula feed like you said the stumbling around in the middle of the night sounds so rough and multiple times day and night seems worth it imo get that but some people will buy them even if they are warned not to better to buy it used for lower price than get another one brand new yeah pretty sure if formula fed would have paid anything to speed up simplify bought all of the bedding and have used anything but the sheet she is 15 months and just sleeps with thin blanket kind of feel like everything else is waste until they are older saw pair of baby pjs that were over 100 does that count they were beautiful but all could think about was those epic blowouts do change the night diaper unless it poopy or leaking keeps him as close to sleeping as possible love my baby bath tub bathe him on the bathroom counter so there no bending and he right by the mirror so he can see himself which really amuses him once he can sit up we ll probably just put him in the regular bath tub never heard of the kuerig or the wearable monitor designer clothing is annoying our crib set did not come with bumper this at that price the pj better clean the blowouts automatically stroller we use it all the time think most parents do giving birth to kiddo with heart defect next month the hospital will send you home with insurance paid for monitoring equipment if the defect is severe if it milder not so much thought parents who bought the video monitors for the nursery were crazy until we got his diagnosis still not sure would do the souped up monitoring app noted in the post especially if our docs do think its necessary not if you live in major city yeah about to have chicago winter baby in an old sometimes drafty brownstone plus wanted to get some kind of wipes container to keep the wipe packs from drying out after they ve been opened and it was 15 for the wipe container with seal vs 25 for the same thing plus warmer figured toss in the extra 10 you do always get discharged with things like that my little sister was premie and her cries were audible for several months she was otherwise healthy sorry food and raw food and my child do go in the same things kitchen sinks have more germs than toilets in most homes oh god this is the first item thought of when saw the title of this post more like peepee rocket agree started using one after many restless nights and it really saved my sanity totally worth the extra 50 dollars have heard many stories where these have saved babies lives mine has never actually gone off thank goodness the sink ai working for our year old but our baby bathtub is still going strong with water restrictions it still great way to clean kid without filling up tub disagree with two items here wipe warmer as others have said it great especially for night time changes only change my son before feeding when he already up but the warm wipes help to keep him in sleepy state also ve used it numerous times to warm washcloths and damp cotton pads for other uses ve found it very handy baby keurig do have one of these but came very close to getting one the appeal for me was it meant my baby would spend less time crying if mix formula on demand all the bubbles give my baby very painful gas if make it ahead of time my baby has to wait minutes while warm bottle we ve opted for the latter and just try to anticipate when he going to be hungry but for while it was heartbreaking to me that my baby had to scream for minutes every time he was hungry because not able to breastfeed anything that made the process easier for him would consider this device is supposed to quickly make formula on demand without bubbles the only reason did get one is because the reviews seemed to overwhelmingly agree that they broke all the time do agree with the clothing one at all yes of course an entire baby chanel wardrobe is dumb and yes my newborn spent 90 of his time in cheap cotton onesies but there are some adorable handmade things on etsy and the like that are great for those first months when you re taking all the pictures do see what wrong with that my mother in law got us wipe warmer so we tried it but all it did was dry the wipes out useless you really have to close the lid after you are done was surprised am usually very pleased with the munchkin brand products but the lid on this thing did have snap closure or anything no rubber seal no pop up button just flip top lid that sat loosely over the opening when you closed it it was bummer
